content:
Today I chose issue 754 for discussion!

Set theory notation
Created by @Dan Velleman (@djvelleman) on 2022-11-27
Labels:

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

This is a very old issue that got almost no attention. My meta programming skills aren't good enough to judge what will be unwanted side effects. @Kyle Miller You've "liked" this on github. What do you think we should do about it? Try to add to the library and see what breaks? Something else?
It was completed in #8850, and I'm not sure I realized that there was a corresponding issue. Closed it.
Yury G. Kudryashov has marked this topic as resolved.
